mpicxx   -O0 -g   CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/Detector.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/FullSystem.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/System.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/AuxiliaryFunction.cppp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/ReadMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/ConstructDetectorMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/CommunicationFunctionMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/DetectorEvolveMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/System_ReadMPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/LW_code_clean_version.dir/MPICode/ComputeDetectorEnergyWindowMPI.cpp.o  -o LW_code_clean_version -lstdc++fs -lmpi
